CustomField.formula: IF( Quote.Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Cloud',TEXT( MONTH( Quote.Opportunity.Contract_End_date_forward__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY( Quote.Opportunity.Contract_End_date_forward__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR( Quote.Opportunity.Contract_End_date_forward__c ) ) , TEXT( MONTH( Quote.Opportunity.Contract_End_date_forward__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY( Quote.Opportunity.Contract_End_date_forward__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR( Quote.Opportunity.Contract_End_date_forward__c ) ))
CustomField.label: Contract Forward Date Calculated
